data.name: Bean Stalker Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Enter the magical branches and take a journey into the musical, strange world of the Bean Stalker.
Contains 26 tracks. Unique music compositions were made for each level. Irish folklore instruments are played on the Tropical level, Middle Eastern and African instruments on the desert level, and Scandinavian instruments on the Artic.
The soundtrack was recorded and composed by Oliver Kovacs.
